thread.section_title: BookIt.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BookIt.com | bookit.com | 6 of 705
thread.title: Leann Dennis

author: Leann Dennis
title: Leann Dennis
text: I was having trouble getting through the online booking page, I called and got a gentleman that wasn't very helpful. After a couple trys on my own, I called my bank to see if the transaction at least showed up there and it did. I was concerned as I didn't get any confirmation that I actually Booked It! In a couple of minutes, an agent called ME! She was extremely polite and helpful and if she hadn't called, I wouldn't have my reservation. Thank you Andrea!
